name: Custom Action
description: Interactive object with a scripted UserAction (doors, switches, pickups)
instructions:
CRITICAL: Use api_search to verify EVERY method you call on Enfusion classes. Never guess method names.
1. Use api_search to find ScriptedUserAction methods and any other classes your action interacts with (e.g., damage managers, inventory, etc.)
2. Edit the InteractAction script to define what happens on interaction — ONLY use methods confirmed by api_search
3. Customize CanBePerformedScript to control when the action is available
4. Customize CanBeShownScript to control visibility
5. Create the interactive prefab — the MeshObject component MUST reference a base game .xob model or the entity will be invisible
6. Add the action to the ActionsManagerComponent in the prefab
7. Place the prefab in a world and test interaction
